amendment.description: An amendment to increase funding for Army Corps of Engineers, Construction by $50,000,000 and reduce funding for Strategic Petroleum Reserve by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to move $50 million from the Strategic Petroleum Reserve account to the Army Corps of Engineers account which handles U.S. water infrastructure projects.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Clawson (FL) amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 143 - 275 (Roll no. 241).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Clawson (FL) amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 143 - 275 (Roll no. 241).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Clawson (FL).
